block.title: We collect
block.description: We have a few partners we work with within the printing industry. We visit them regularly to collect all their excessive paper for reuse. Our Partners

block.title: We design
block.description: After collection, we carry out the designing of various collections. Because of the nature of the paper source, the paper comes in various forms and characteristics. For the best results and optimum utilisation, each collection is designed around a specific paper. All printed elements like logos or patterns are hand drawn and duplicated using [Chez Rosi’s](www.chezrosi.be/) Risograph.

block.title: We bind
block.description: We put the work together with our last finishing touch; a binding technique is chosen which best suits the collection.

block.title: You create
block.description: Once it’s in your hands, you are free to use it however you like! **\#TemplateNote** Pickup a Template Note now
